name: Heatblast
abilities: Fire generation, fire manipulation, heat absorption, flight
description: A Pyronite made of magma who can generate and manipulate fire and can be a walking rock man on fire.

name: Wildmutt
abilities: Enhanced senses, speed, agility, biting
description: A canine-like Vulpimancer alien with no eyes, enhanced senses of smell and hearing, and a fierce, agile fighting style.

name: Diamondhead
abilities: Crystal generation, super durability, melee constructs
description: A crystalline Petrosapien with a body made of dense, diamond-like material. He can grow and shape crystalline structures from his body, and fire sharp crystal shards.

name: XLR8
abilities: Super speed, rapid reflexes, vortex generation
description: A fast, reptilian Kineceleran alien with incredible speed and reflexes. He can run at supersonic speeds and create powerful tornadoes.

name: Grey Matter
abilities: Genius-level intellect, stealth, wall climbing
description: A tiny but brilliant Galvan whose super-intelligence allows him to solve complex problems and build advanced technology.

name: Four Arms
abilities: Super strength, shockwave clap, durability
description: A powerful Tetramand with immense superhuman strength, enhanced durability, and the ability to create powerful shockwaves with his hands.

name: Stinkfly
abilities: Flight, acidic sprays, sticky nets
description: A large, insect-like Lepidopterran alien with large wings and four eyes. He can fly at high speeds, and spray foul-smelling liquid from his eyes.

name: Ripjaws
abilities: Underwater breathing, powerful jaws, swimming
description: An amphibious Piscciss Volann alien with sharp claws, a tail, and powerful jaws. He is a skilled underwater swimmer and can chew through solid material.

name: Upgrade
abilities: Merge with machinery, tech upgrade, shapeshifting metallic forms
description: A sentient, liquid-metallic Galvanic Mechamorph. He can merge with and control technology, and shape-shift his body.

name: Ghostfreak
abilities: Intangibility, invisibility, possession
description: An Ectonurite who can turn invisible and intangible, possess the bodies of others, and use sharp tentacles hidden beneath his outer skin.

name: Cannonbolt
abilities: Roll into armored ball, high-impact tackles, durability
description: A large, heavily armored Arburian Pelarota alien who can curl into a near-invulnerable ball and roll at high speeds to smash through obstacles.

name: Wildvine
abilities: Plant control, regeneration, entangling vines
description: A plant-like alien with a durable, vine-like body. He can stretch his limbs, grow sharp thorns, and fire sticky, organic projectiles.

name: Snare-oh
abilities: Trapping, constriction, venom
description: A mummy-like alien whose bandages are elastic and can regenerate, allowing him to shapeshift, stretch, and fit into tight spaces.

name: Ditto
abilities: Duplication, coordinated attacks
description: A small, amphibious, frog-like Splixson alien with the power of self-replication. He can create multiple copies of himself, and all clones share a hive mind and feel each other's pain.

name: Eye Guy
abilities: Multiple eye beams, vision-based attacks
description: A green-skinned alien with eyes covering his entire body, who can fire a wide variety of energy blasts from his many eyes, including a powerful eye beam from his chest.

name: Way Big
abilities: Gigantic size, cosmic energy blasts, super strength
description: A giant, humanoid To'kustar alien who is one of the largest and most powerful aliens in the Omnitrix. He can fire cosmic energy beams.

name: Upchuck
abilities: Consume materials and fire as projectiles
description: A small, green, frog-like Gourmand alien with a long, adhesive tongue. He can eat and digest almost any material and then project a powerful energy blast.

name: Spitter
abilities: Can shoot high-pressure slime, durable body, can inflate himself for defense
description: A pufferfish-like Spheroid who can shoot a concentrated stream of super-adhesive, pressurized slime from his mouth.

name: Buzzshock
abilities: Electricity generation, energy travel through wires, duplication by splitting
description: A small, battery-like Nosedeenian alien who can absorb, generate, and manipulate electricity. He can travel through electrical conduits at high speed and duplicate himself when he has enough power.

name: Arctiguana
abilities: Ice breath, cryokinesis, extreme cold resistance
description: A Polar Manzardill who can breathe a powerful, long-range freezing ray that can instantly freeze liquids, including lava.

name: Blitzwolfer
abilities: Super strength, agility, enhanced hearing, sonic howls
description: A Loboan werewolf-like alien with enhanced senses, speed, and sharp claws, whose main weapon is a powerful sonic howl.

name: Frankenstrike
abilities: Electrokinesis, super strength, durability, can recharge devices
description: A Frankenstein-inspired alien who can generate and manipulate electricity, use magnetism to stick to metal, and possesses enhanced strength.

name: Stinkarms
abilities: Super strength, wall-climbing, slime spray, can emit toxic gas
firstAppearance: Dr. Animo and the Mutant Ray
description: A fusion alien combining the DNA of Four Arms and Stinkfly. He possesses enhanced strength, flight, and the ability to spray slime from his eyes.

name: Heat Jaws
abilities: Fire and magma generation underwater, can swim in lava, powerful bite
firstAppearance: Dr. Animo and the Mutant Ray
description: A hybrid of Heatblast and Ripjaws, this alien combines Ripjaws' sharp teeth and underwater breathing with Heatblast's fire powers, which become scalding steam underwater
